description: Two columns blog layout with old paper background.
name: mecha-cms/y.outdoorsy

suggest.mecha-cms/x.comment: Install this extension if you want to have comment feature in your blog.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.feed: Install this extension if you want to have feed feature in your blog.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.sitemap: Install this extension if you want to have sitemap feature in your blog.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.user: Install this extension if you want to have log-in/out feature in your blog.
